flavor:
That moment of bliss. That feeling of accomplishment. That certainty of purpose.
What's next?
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Access 1 installed card (non-ice).
text:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Access 1 installed card (non-ice).
title: Quest Completed

flavor: Bleeding data is more of a science than an art. Too much and you can end up with a one-way ticket to flatline city. Not enough and you might as well be running an empty server.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 virus counter on Hemorrhage. click, 2 hosted virus counters: The Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
text: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 virus counter on Hemorrhage. [click], 2 hosted virus counters: The Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
title: Hemorrhage

flavor: Stick with your plan and you'll be fine. Stick with the plan.
stripped_text: Whenever a gray ops or black ops operation is trashed after resolving, you may give the Corp 1 bad publicity and take 1 tag. trash: Draw 1 card for each bad publicity the Corp has.
text: Whenever a gray ops or black ops operation is trashed after resolving, you may give the Corp 1 bad publicity and take 1 tag. [trash]: Draw 1 card for each bad publicity the Corp has.
title: Tallie Perrault

flavor: "When you need someone who is a little more hands on, look me up." -Silhouette
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Reveal all cards in HQ.
text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Reveal all cards in HQ.
title: Executive Wiretaps

flavor: The power of the focused mind is a power beyond comprehension.
stripped_text: +2 mu Whenever you expose a card, the Corp must rez it by paying its rez cost, if able. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +2[mu] Whenever you expose a card, the Corp must rez it by paying its rez cost, if able. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Blackguard

flavor: "CyberSolutions is a boring name for a company that makes pretty exciting products. Their memory chips have some pretty tricky stuff going on inside and I keep hearing good things about their M/MI implants. I even heard they were on the path to their own androids about a year ago. I wonder whatever happened with that?" -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
stripped_text: +2 mu
title: CyberSolutions Mem Chip

stripped_text: 1 credit: Break ice subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. Use Alpha only on the outermost piece of ice protecting a server.
text:
1[credit]: Break ice subroutine.
1[credit]: +1 strength.
Use Alpha only on the outermost piece of ice protecting a server.
title: Alpha

stripped_text: 1 credit: Break ice subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. Use Omega only on the innermost piece of ice protecting a server.
text:
1[credit]: Break ice subroutine.
1[credit]: +1 strength.
Use Omega only on the innermost piece of ice protecting a server.
title: Omega

stripped_text: Play only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity. Make a run. The Corp cannot rez ice for the duration of this run.
text:
Play only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity.
Make a run. The Corp cannot rez ice for the duration of this run.
title: Blackmail

flavor: Blue-one level clearance doesn't exist. And if it did exist, you wouldn't be cleared to know about it.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Gain 5 credits and draw 2 cards.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Gain 5[credit] and draw 2 cards.
title: Blue Level Clearance

stripped_text: Each time the Runner accesses an agenda from this server, he or she must spend click as an additional cost in order to steal it. This applies even during the run on which the Runner trashes Strongbox.
text: Each time the Runner accesses an agenda from this server, he or she must spend [click] as an additional cost in order to steal it. This applies even during the run on which the Runner trashes Strongbox.
title: Strongbox

stripped_text: Toshiyuki Sakai can be advanced. If Toshiyuki Sakai is accessed while installed, you may swap him with an agenda or asset from HQ. The new agenda or asset is installed unrezzed, and keeps all advancement tokens on Toshiyuki Sakai. The Runner can choose not to access the new card.
text:
Toshiyuki Sakai can be advanced.
If Toshiyuki Sakai is accessed while installed, you may swap him with an agenda or asset from HQ. The new agenda or asset is installed unrezzed, and keeps all advancement tokens on Toshiyuki Sakai. The Runner can choose not to access the new card.
title: Toshiyuki Sakai

flavor: The 'cyber-war' is a war of information, and in a war of information, advance warning can be as good as a killing blow. -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime
stripped_text: Subroutine Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
text:
[subroutine] Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
title: Yagura

flavor: He slowly pried open the lid, and the tantō glinted madly in the half-light. The executive motioned to the blade. Looks like the meeting was being cut short.
stripped_text: Trash one of your installed sysops, executives, or clones. If you do, remove up to 2 bad publicity.
text: Trash one of your installed sysops, executives, or clones. If you do, remove up to 2 bad publicity.
title: Restoring Face

stripped_text: If the Runner is tagged when you score Market Research, place 1 agenda counter on it. Market Research is worth 1 additional agenda point while it has an agenda counter on it.
text:
If the Runner is tagged when you score Market Research, place 1 agenda counter on it.
Market Research is worth 1 additional agenda point while it has an agenda counter on it.
title: Market Research

flavor: "It can make a real fine roller coaster, provided you're properly stimmed up." -Noise
stripped_text: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. Subroutine End the run.
text: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Wraparound

stripped_text: You start the game with 10 credits and 1 bad publicity.
text: You start the game with 10[credit] and 1 bad publicity.
title: GRNDL: Power Unleashed

flavor: "I did warn you that leaks would have to be patched."
stripped_text: When you score Vulcan Coverup, do 2 meat damage. When the Runner steals Vulcan Coverup, take 1 bad publicity.
text:
When you score Vulcan Coverup, do 2 meat damage.
When the Runner steals Vulcan Coverup, take 1 bad publicity.
title: Vulcan Coverup

flavor: GRNDL refineries process many different rare elements unearthed during the fracking process.
stripped_text: GRNDL Refinery can be advanced. click, trash: Gain 4 credits for each advancement token on GRNDL Refinery.
text:
GRNDL Refinery can be advanced.
[click], [trash]: Gain 4[credit] for each advancement token on GRNDL Refinery.
title: GRNDL Refinery

stripped_text: Gain 1 credit. The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain click. When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
text:
Gain 1[credit].
The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain [click].
When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
title: Subliminal Messaging
